summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CryptoVault Fly.io migration. All Fly.io specific endpoints, configuration files, and deployment scripts are working correctly. Backend health endpoints are functional and auto-scaling configuration is properly set.

minor_issues.issue: Fly.io environment variables return 'unknown' values in local development
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - will show actual values when deployed to Fly.io

passed_tests: Fly.io status endpoint (/api/fly/status) returns platform info
Fly.io region endpoint (/api/fly/region) returns region info
Fly.io instances endpoint (/api/fly/instances) returns instance info
Fly.io health endpoint (/api/fly/health/fly) returns healthy status
fly.toml has auto-scaling config with min=1 and max=3
Dockerfile.fly exists and is valid with multi-stage build and health check
vercel.json points to fly.dev URL not render.com
Deployment scripts (deploy-fly.sh, verify-fly-deployment.sh) exist and are executable
